title: Initial Contact Call
description: First contact call to discuss product interest

details.notes: Customer showed strong interest in premium package. Requested detailed pricing information and demo scheduling.

title: WhatsApp Follow-up
description: Follow-up chat session after initial call

details.summary: Provided pricing details and scheduled demo for next week

title: Demo Preparation Notes
description: Preparation notes for upcoming product demo

details.content: Customer specifically interested in automation features and integration capabilities. Focus demo on workflow automation and API integrations. Has existing CRM system that needs integration.

title: Integration Support Request
description: Customer needs help with API integration setup

details.resolution: Working with development team on custom integration solution

title: Technical Consultation
description: Technical consultation call for integration requirements

details.notes: Detailed technical requirements gathered. Customer needs custom webhook integration with Salesforce. Estimated 2-3 days development time.

title: Billing Inquiry
description: Customer inquiry about billing and subscription options

details.summary: Explained pricing plans and provided discount code for annual subscription

details.content: Customer committed to annual subscription. Approved 15% discount (code: ANNUAL15). Follow up in 3 days if no response.

title: Cold Outreach Call
description: Initial cold outreach call to potential lead

details.notes: Left voicemail with brief introduction and value proposition. Will follow up with WhatsApp message.

details.resolution: Forwarded to product team for evaluation

details.content: High-value prospect from enterprise segment. Company size 500+ employees. Current pain points with existing solution. Strong budget authority. Schedule executive demo.
